summary: REQ-38 and REQ-39 appear largely implemented via a centralized image mapping plus UI/layout/style refinements across Dashboard/Planner/Outreach, cards, AppShell, SidebarNav, and global CSS utilities. However, REQ-37 is only partially evidenced (a mapping exists) with no evidence that the 14 image files were actually added to the frontend static assets directory. The diff summary also indicates unrequested/auth-related and export-format behavior changes that fall outside the UI polish scope and non-goals.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add all 14 uploaded image files to the frontend static assets directory so they load correctly in production builds (no broken links).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows a constants mapping pointing to "/assets/uploaded/..." paths, but provides no evidence that the actual 14 image files were added under a static assets directory (e.g., frontend/public/assets/uploaded).

hallucinated_features.description: Removed authentication/sign-in gating to allow direct access without sign-in, and adjusted multiple hooks/pages to support guest access.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists auth changes as non-goals, and this work is unrelated to integrating images / UI elegance.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt ("frontend/src/App.tsx": authentication gate removed; hooks updated for guest users; SignInPage made optional)

hallucinated_features.description: Changed export behavior/file types (e.g., PDF export downloads HTML, DOCX export downloads RTF, Excel uses .xls MIME/type) and updated related user messaging.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals include "exports logic changes"; these changes appear functional/behavioral rather than purely UI polish.
